job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions, which is a core task in adapting and improving AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies are fundamental software development activities, even when applied to AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of different capabilities (human and AI) to deliver a service, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products, a key aspect of learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes self-sufficiency and problem-solving without constant managerial guidance, aligning with problem-solving and pragmatism.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on integrating AI capabilities into customer support resolutions and improving AI systems through feedback and fine-tuning. While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning, the core emphasis is on applying and improving existing AI within a support function, rather than developing novel AI models from scratch. The tasks are primarily about enhancing a software system (customer support) with AI, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile. There are no explicit mentions of traditional ML or GenAI specialist tasks like model architecture design, prompt engineering, or data engineering for model training.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a support context. However, it lacks specific technical tool mentions and doesn't delve deeply into the nuances of AI model development, making the classification lean towards 'AI-Adjacent' rather than a more specialized AI role. The emphasis on rapid ramp-up and self-sufficiency is clear, but the AI-specific technical depth is less defined.
